google_reviews.author: John K. Cummings
google_reviews.review: Landmark is very professional and courteous property Management group. I really enjoyed the two years that I lived in their apartment. I got to know Marianna well and appreciate everything she did for me. I highly recommend if you're a renter using landmark property management group.

google_reviews.author: melinda pearson
google_reviews.review: So far, the application process with Landmark has been smooth! The various staff members I've spoken with have been friendly and helpful, and the process was made extremely clear. Their application fee is $65, compared to $50 for most other property managers in Bellingham, but so far that is our only criticism. Move-in is in September so will update with any new feedback then, but they have so far proven trustworthy, communicative and friendly. And their portal is really helpful also!

google_reviews.author: Jeremy Glasgow
google_reviews.review: My sister and I have been working to get approved for a townhouse unit under Landmark. We worked with Frank on the application process, and he was great. There were many hoops I had to jump through when he was verifying my rental history due to errors from my prior management companies, and Frank was patient and understanding throughout the whole process. After I got it cleared up he sent us notification that we were approved for the unit as well. He was communicative throughout the whole process, which is something that spoke volumes to me, especially given that my current management company doesnt communicate with their tenants about anything. Overall, I had a great experience with the application process with Landmark!

google_reviews.author: Bianca Benfanti
google_reviews.review: Had a recent experience with the discovery of mold in our rental property and my husband and I really appreciated how much Cami, our property manager, handled the whole thing! We were able to move into a different rental within the week and the whole process was super smooth. Cami was super attentive and considerate, keeping in mind that I was 38 weeks pregnant and could be due any day. She was on top of making sure we were appropriately compensated and settled down.

google_reviews.author: Cheyenne Mills
google_reviews.review: Landmark is the best Property Management company to have when renting. They are professional, efficient, and fair. Our family of 6 has had the best experience with them since day one! They moved mountains so we could move in almost 2 weeks early with our 5 day old baby. They have also been fair and effective when dealing with neighborly disputes. Our assigned property manager, Cami Winslow, has been absolutely wonderful and the most understanding. We feel very blessed to have found this place and this great company at such a stressful time in our lives.

google_reviews.author: Ana Ferreira
google_reviews.review:
I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt appreciation for the outstanding management of Cami Winslow.
As a tenant, i have been consistently impressed by her dedication, professionalism and genuine care for this place I call home.
Her promptness in addressing maintenance issues, inquiries, knowing that we can rely on her to swiftly handle any concerns that arise, brings me a sense of security and comfort.
Cami has an approachable nature and warm demeanor. Her willingness to listen to my concerns and address them with empathy and understanding truly sets her apart as an exceptional property manager. We are incredibly grateful to have been here for 3 years and excited to keep calling this place our home.
Thank you Cami! Youre truly the best!

google_reviews.author: Tanner Larson
google_reviews.review: We've had two property managers with landmark, both of which have been excellent. More recently, Caitlin has been our contact. Her communication has been great and she has already earned our trust by completing complex projects quickly and under budget. She has also handled sensitive issues with a high level of professionalism which is appreciated. I would recommend this property manager to others.

google_reviews.author: Alyssa Jackson
google_reviews.review: We had a great experience from start to finish with Landmark. They were gracious and accommodating especially when things didnt go planned. Cami was quick to rely to email and phone calls. She advocated for our requests. We didnt have to wait long for things to get repaired. We are leaving happy!

google_reviews.author: Miranda Cox
google_reviews.review: I rented through landmark for 2 years and never had any issues while there. I spoke with Lolly regarding some questions I had about my lease and she was very quick to respond and gave me all of the information I needed. I appreciated her working with me and taking the time to explain all my options.

google_reviews.author: Ben Robinett
google_reviews.review: Absolutely stellar experience with Landmark Real Estate Management! From day one, their professionalism and dedication shone through. Their seamless handling of every aspect of property management, from tenant screenings to maintenance requests, exceeded my expectations. Communication was prompt and transparent, ensuring peace of mind throughout. Their proactive approach and attention to detail truly set them apart. Trustworthy, reliable, and efficient  Landmark Real Estate Management is the epitome of excellence in property management. I wholeheartedly recommend their services to anyone seeking top-tier management for their properties. Five stars without hesitation!

google_reviews.author: Brianna Matthews
google_reviews.review: I will start off by saying the only con about the building is that the windows in the units dont open all the way. Other then that the common room for guest to go into is a great place to hang out and you can even hook up your gaming devices to the tv in there. The roof is a great place to go to have a party or to enjoy the fire pit with friends and lastly the work out room is great and helpful too.

google_reviews.author: Rochelle Macagba
google_reviews.review: When we moved in, our light bulbs were put in incorrectly and Cami was extremely responsive and able to help us quickly. We are now ending our 1.5yr lease and between Cami and Yanna, we were so well taken care of. The immediate responses, attention to detail and patience they had with us through difficult times are what made us rate them 5 stars. This is our second place and second lease ending with Landmark. I will be applying with them again

google_reviews.author: Dana Reavis
google_reviews.review: Angie did a great job! She answered all my questions, and was very informative. Ocean at the office was very patient and kind in connecting me with the Property Manager and answering questions about the various properties I was looking at. She made sure I found the right place!

google_reviews.author: Ellen Wojtanek
google_reviews.review: I have lived in a lovely residence, managed by Landmark, for a couple of years now. Its so nice to have a rental company that is easy to work with, responds quickly, and always follows through. Shoutout to my property manager, Cami Winslow, and her team for the consistent care and attention to detail and always making sure things run smooth!

google_reviews.author: Jack
google_reviews.review: My friend and I had a fantastic experience renting from landmark. Our property manager Marianna was always on top of everything, whether it was maintenance requests, lease stuff, or moving out it was always a stress free and easy process. Would definitely recommend renting from them

google_reviews.author: Enrique Romero Jr.
google_reviews.review: After being displaced from our home because of burst sprinkler, Landmark has been communicative and working really hard to get us into a new place. Overall, the management is great on a daily basis, whether it's issues with parking or with maintenance. Katherine, Wanda, Sue, and all the workers through the 8 or so years I have lived at their complex have been nice and treated me fairly. They are professional, courteous, and work hard. Twin Pines Apartments are run well and recommended for anyone looking for a nice, comfortable apartment to call home.

google_reviews.author: Elisheva Mechir
google_reviews.review: Both my roommate Cynthia and I have nothing but praise for Landmark Real Estate Management. And our experience working with our property manager Cami Winslow, has been has been an absolute pleasure! We both agree that choosing Landmark Reality Management was the best decision we could have ever made. Keep up the great work. Both my roommate and I appreciate all that you do!!  Sincerely, Elisheva Mechir & Cynthia Williams.

google_reviews.author: Cynthia Williams
google_reviews.review: I have always had prompt polite and professional communication and service with Landmark Real Estate Management. Cami Lawrence the property manager is not only professional and reliable she is also very compassionate and understanding. So thankful to have them as our property management company.

google_reviews.author: Wesley Cox
google_reviews.review:
Originally moved from out of state and the staff were amazing at helping me find a place and get all the correct paperwork done! I typically would talk to Ocean at the front desk who was always helpful but I was never turned away by any other front office staff.

Recently a pipe had burst in our current unit and our property manager was extremely helpful throughout the entire process. She helped us pick out alternative units and worked really hard to get our application the attention it needed!

Overall Im very pleased, Ive never had them ignore a maintenance request and they have always been very attentive and caring in times of need!

google_reviews.author: Charlie Devereux
google_reviews.review: Just getting started as a co-signer. The non-refundable application fee for all applicants and their co-signers seems excessive, but other than that they seem to be a decent operation. The background checks are a pain but also are appreciated, as parents of a student renter.

google_reviews.author: Yvonne
google_reviews.review: Ive been working with Cami Winslow to get into a new place and she was super helpful and quick to respond. Jill in applications was also amazing in helping me and setting my mind at ease when I ran into a personal issue. Im very grateful for the team at Landmark and all the help I received.

google_reviews.author: Gail Stringer
google_reviews.review: Kathryn (sp?) and Frank were great to work with. As a mom of a college student calling from far away I was rather clueless about the whole process and Kathryn was so helpful! She made your company feel like they actually care about the tenants (students) with whom they interact all year long. She graciously talked me through a lot of the co-signing and rental process. Thank you!!  Gail

google_reviews.author: Staci Shrum
google_reviews.review:
Thank you so much to Caitlin McAdams. She is the property manager where my parents live.
The building suffered a burst sprinkler main during the cold streak in January. Several units were impacted, including my parents apartment. My parents needed to vacate their damaged and flooded home. Caitlin helped all of us navigate the next steps. She kept us in the loop by communicating the next steps. She was responsive when we had questions/concerns. She advocated for my parents. Thank you, Caitlin!
And thank you to Marianna Massullo for your continued support. Marianna worked closely with my parents when they first moved in. Again, she was so responsive and helpful.
I appreciate the respectful communication and kindness shown.

google_reviews.author: Gillian Naranjo
google_reviews.review: Tiffany was great!! She was out tour guide on checking out a place and she was amazing!! So beyond kind and was able to answer all of our questions. Very greatful for her guidance and kindness

google_reviews.author: Chester Pownall
google_reviews.review: Just renewed my lease with Landmark Real Estate Management for the 3rd year in a row.  Ive felt like every concern Ive had over the 3 years Ive been a tenant has been answered in a prop and timely manner.  Most renters have encountered challenges with their rental. A appliance goes out, issues with a fuse box etc which is of course to be expected. Any homeowner can tell you the challenges one can face within the home and what it takes to fix it.  As a renter, its so important to have a landlord or management company that takes these issues seriously and fixes them promptly.  Fortunately with our Manager Cami Winslow, every concern or issue has been resolved quickly and fixed correctly.  Knowing that these things will be fixed when needed is invaluable and the biggest reason we are staying with Landmark and at our current residence.

google_reviews.author: Lynda Lehrke
google_reviews.review: I want to give a shout out to our Manager Haelley at Maritime Heritage! She is very personable, friendly, and eager to help. Whenever I ask for assistance to address an issue, she responds immediately and effectively. We are very fortunate to have such a hands on person to troubleshoot for us. She is a keeper for sure!

google_reviews.author: Barbara Yarar
google_reviews.review: I had a very good experience viewing two of landmarks properties with the hopes to move in to one with a water view. Tia was quite welcoming as soon as I arrived, had info about the properties , 3 total, and accommodated seeing them back to back to save time. She showed me every room and was very friendly, I shared my circumstances and my wish list and she was able to show me exactly what I was looking for. I appreciated the time she took, I immediately proc ended to put down the hold fee and am hopeful I will be in this new unit within the month.

google_reviews.author: Lesly Mendoza
google_reviews.review: During my rental experience, it was very amicable to work with Marianna Masullo, she insured that I had a place to stay with a smooth transition when changing units. She would go above and beyond to ensure her tenants are happy and properly informed. I will definitely lease back again with Landmark. The entire staff is very friendly, and they take the time to listen and ensure every need is taking care off. Thank you Landmark.

google_reviews.author: Joshua Hauserman
google_reviews.review:
My experience with the apartment staff during the application process was nothing short of exceptional. From the very beginning, they displayed an impressive level of receptiveness and willingness to address all my questions and concerns.

One standout quality was their ability to collaborate. They not only listened attentively but also responded promptly and effectively, making the entire process notably smoother. Their ability to accommodate and address any challenges I encountered during the move-in phase was particularly commendable. I felt genuinely supported and understood, which made a significant difference in my overall experience.

Their proactive and professional approach stood out, as they worked diligently to ensure that any hurdles or difficulties I faced were promptly resolved. Their willingness to go above and beyond to ensure a seamless transition into the apartment was truly appreciated.

The staff's commitment to excellence and their dedication to ensuring a positive experience for tenants, especially during the critical phase of moving in, was highly impressive. I am grateful for their support and understanding, which significantly contributed to making my transition into the new apartment a much smoother process.

I wholeheartedly recommend this apartment complex, not only for its facilities but also for its exceptional staff who truly understand the importance of customer service and satisfaction.

Thank you to the entire team for their outstanding support and accommodation throughout the application and move-in process.

google_reviews.author: Jadey
google_reviews.review: Landmark has been extremely helpful and amazing to work with. I've rented from Landmark since 2011 and have been so grateful for their support, prompt responses and excellent service over the years. One of the best property management companies I've ever rented from. I honestly don't understand the negative reviews. They never leave you hanging and resolve maintenance requests promptly.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Jadey, Thank you for the 5 star review!

google_reviews.author: Kala Bay
google_reviews.review: I am tenant and I had a flood happen in my apartment recently. There was a gap in communication with my property manager, but when I tried to follow up, I reached the front desk. Ocean, the first lady I spoke with, was rude and short with me. She doesn't tell you what she is going to do she just sends you off to someone. I asked her not to just send me off to a voicemail, because this was a time sensitive matter and instead of talking with me to solve this issue, she transferred me anyway. When I called back in, I got someone else (I can't remember her name, unfortunately) and she was extremely disrespectful. I don't know what happened in the two minutes it took me to call back, but as soon as I introduced myself, she had a terrible attitude. Immediately was talking over me, cutting me off when I tried to explain the situation, raised her voice at me, and accused me of yelling at her. It was the WORST customer service interaction I've ever had. She was extremely rude, disrespectful, unkind, unwilling to help resolve the issue at hand, as is her job. She is obviously incapable of handling that position, if that is how she treats the tenants calling in for assistance. I asked to be transferred to her supervisor, and she was snarky about it, but luckily transferred me right away. I spoke with Wendy. Wendy was amazing. Clearly, knew how to do her job, and what customer service meant. Literally, all I wanted was an escalation so that my property manager knew that I was trying to reach her about a time sensitive issue. That's it. That's a completely reasonable request, and Wendy was able to  help me with that in 5 minutes. So, in my experience, don't go into that office, expecting to be treated with dignity. At least not by those two workers. They showed very clearly that they have no desire to be respectful or uphold any standard to customer service.

google_reviews.author: Kathleen Beaty
google_reviews.review:
"Working with property management companies, this one stands out as exceptionally organized. I want to express my gratitude for Kristina Pollard (and her teams) exceptional level of communication, responsiveness, and professionalism. It's truly refreshing to deal with a team that is so well-coordinated and efficient.
Thank you for making the process smooth and hassle-free!"

google_reviews.author: Sophia Rose
google_reviews.review: The Landmark team was incredibly helpful and communicative with us during our renting process! They answered all of our questions promptly and made sure we had everything we needed to move forward.

google_reviews.author: Shaun Pattenden
google_reviews.review: Yesterday, I was in Bellingham to look for an apartment. With Ocean's cheerful and capable assistance, I was able to view several Landmark apartments.  It was my first time in Bellingham and the whole thing went quite well. Thank you, Ocean!

google_reviews.author: Jackie Braverman
google_reviews.review: This is a mixed review. Angie was just terrific..she gets the five stars. But dealing with so many different people at Landmark has been frustrating. Each person has a different role so they cant answer for anyone else and the pieces are not well coordinated. Though the individuals may be doing good work on their part of the operation, the overall process gets a 2.

google_reviews.author: Ashley Hunter
google_reviews.review: We had a very good experience viewing one of landmarks properties with the hopes to move in. Tia was quite welcoming as soon as we arrived, had info about the property as well as what was left to be done in preparation of new renters. She showed us every room and was very friendly. We appreciated the time she took with our family.

google_reviews.author: Domenica Dee
google_reviews.review: absolutely love this community The atmosphere is welcoming, the amenities are great, and the staffespecially Caitlin is incredibly professional and attentive. Highly recommend this business to anyone looking for comfortable and well-managed living!

google_reviews.author: Marisela Payet
google_reviews.review: The tour was great. Haelley was very informative and answered all of our questions. The building is beautiful and she made sure to show us all of the amenities.

google_reviews.author: Alex
google_reviews.review: Very poor communication. Was super hard to get ahold of (called 3 times just to be transferred by the front desk lady to the manager's voicemail, got nowhere and eventually drove 20 minutes to discuss it in person which I should have done to begin with because a DIFFERENT front desk lady did the exact thing I was asking the other lady to do over the phone) and when I did actually talk to them I got told five different things. At first we were told we could put down 2 extra monthly payments since at the time we didn't have rental history or credit scores and then we got told we had to have both and needed a co-signer since we "didn't meet requirements". Application fees are obnoxiously expensive and not worth losing your hard earned money over.

google_reviews.author: Hai Tran
google_reviews.review: Landmarks staffs are professional. There are many nice people here. I like Kristina very much. She is very quick response and help us a lot for commercial things.

google_reviews.author: Thomas Kolba (Tom)
google_reviews.review: I give Sophia Place apartments property, Landmark Real Estate in Bellingham five stars.  The building is well kept, and Sophia manager, Lolly, is very communicative.  This, to me, is key to a successful renter/landlord relationship.  I appreciate the service at Sophia and am delighted to be a resident here.

google_reviews.author: Jim Warford
google_reviews.review: Angie, the Showing Agent, was wonderful. Knowledgeable, friendly and easy to talk to. Both properties are possibilities for us and still on our list.

google_reviews.author: Emma S
google_reviews.review: Ocean and Graham went above and beyond! After a key mishap they ensured my day off and 1.5hr drive wasnt useless! Thank you for taking the time to show me another similar unit and answer all of my questions. Super helpful and generous with their time and knowledge.

google_reviews.author: Kylaijah Mathis
google_reviews.review: Tia Herring Help us so much on finding our first appartment. She has great input. Just make sure you come in perpared and she is a wonderful help. Also We did go ask for help in person with printed out forms (places/, travel time, Questions, price preferseces, etc.)

google_reviews.author: sandi coson
google_reviews.review: I am so pleased with the job that Cami Winslow has done for me since she has been my property manager. She cares about her clients and their property and I highly recommend her!

google_reviews.author: Enedina Espinoza
google_reviews.review: I have rented from land mark for the last 2 years and have had nothing but a great experience especially when working with Carmela and Leslie they are efficient and reliable people when working with landmark! Any and all issues were handled correctly and efficiently thank you ladys for your help!

google_reviews.author: Angelina Kollodge
google_reviews.review: Landmark Real Estate, specifically Frank Youngblood, always promptly replied and provided resources for any questions I had. The move-in process for my new apartment was smooth and efficient.

google_reviews.author: Josslyn Ireland
google_reviews.review: I spoke with Tia over the phone and she has been very informative, professional, and helpful. It has been a pleasure working with Landmark. They make the process easy and straightforward.

google_reviews.author: Its Amber Renae
google_reviews.review: I would like to recognize Cami and Yanna at Landmark for being such a diligent, and caring team! Maintenance issues are quickly addressed, the property is regularly visited and maintained, and communication has always been professional and fast.

google_reviews.author: Brian Lynch
google_reviews.review: My interaction with Carmela has been fantastic! She is extremely professional, organized and personable. Landmark is lucky to have such a great representative!

google_reviews.author: Stacy Stones
google_reviews.review: I've had mixed experiences overall, but it seems they've really stepped up their customer service recently. I really appreciated how incredibly helpful Kristina was in answering my questions and getting me connected to the right department.

google_reviews.author: Natalia Valdivia
google_reviews.review: The team is fantastic. Very professional and prompt on tenant inquires. They have been very friendly and helpful every step of the way! :)

google_reviews.author: Ellie White
google_reviews.review: Im in the beginning process of renting a unit from Landmark so I cant attest to how the company is for existing tenants, but I can say that Ive had a positive experience touring the unit with Victoria and going through the application process with Ocean. Both ladies were knowledgeable and friendly and made an otherwise stressful experience painless.

google_reviews.author: Lynda Alexander
google_reviews.review: Great property management team. Appreciate the professionalism and attention to detail. Great selection of rental units to lease. Also everyone has been very kind.

google_reviews.author: Windy Paige Dvorak
google_reviews.review: We've had great experiences with Landmark and especially with Marianna, who is absolutely amazing to work with any time we have any questions or issues.

google_reviews.author: Bellingham Bar
google_reviews.review: Haelley is fantastic to work with. She helped me get situated and worked with me on a shorter term lease. Shes efficient, kind and knowledgeable.

google_reviews.author: Randi Fischer
google_reviews.review: Kristina has been instrumental in bringing me on as a vendor to do business with Landmark, the communication with her and the smooth efficiency of Savannah's onboarding process has me excited to start and meet more of the team! Thank you!

google_reviews.author: Sydney Rayburn
google_reviews.review: Ocean at the front desk is quick to respond and super helpful! So far this company has made planning a move across the country alot less stressful!

google_reviews.author: Scott McIntosh
google_reviews.review: My rent is VERY high and for what I pay I would expect better appliances. They have been responsive to the two maintenance requests I have submitted in the almost two (2) years I have lived here. Updated 4/3/2024 - I informed Landmark that I wanted to downsize over 2 months ago and no-one ever called me. I ended up switching to another property management company (ACP). Even now Landmark is not answering their phones. Although I loved the house, it was just too much house for me alone and I am happy that ACP assisted me with downsizing. Honestly, stay away from Landmark.

google_reviews.author: Leo Craig
google_reviews.review: Angie was a great help showing me around the apartment. Answered all my questions and was open about property details.

google_reviews.author: Leah Carpentier
google_reviews.review: Haelley at 1818 D Street property was extremely helpful.  She showed me all of the apartments that were currently available and made sure I had all of my questions answered.

google_reviews.author: Ember Hamilton
google_reviews.review: My sister lives at this property and she asked me to write a review about how much she loves it here its always amazing especially when she needs help with anything its fast and reliable Caitlin always helps her and makes her day so much easier whenever there is a problem!!

google_reviews.author: Giacomo Moody
google_reviews.review: Scheduling a tour was pretty easy, and the showing agent was great and helpful. Some vital information was left out on the website, but was revealed during the tour.

google_reviews.author: Daniel Sabala
google_reviews.review: I am a vendor for Katlyn at Landmark. It has been a pleasure to work with Katlyn. Due to her honesty, professionalism , and is always easy communicate with.

google_reviews.author: Debbie Schoeppler
google_reviews.review: Living at one of the Landmark Properties has been a joy. The Property Manager Cami Winslow is so easy to work with and if there is a problem, she gets things done. Will miss living there.

google_reviews.author: Francine Lunardi Farias
google_reviews.review: I had a tour today in one property, Victoria was my showing agent and she did great. She is very kind,  and she was always trying to help me and answering all my questions.

google_reviews.author: Matthew Clark
google_reviews.review: Lolly and the rest of the team at Landmark were friendly, responsive, and professional in helping us get into our apartment.

google_reviews.author: Shiroh Moriya
google_reviews.review: Landmark is the best management company we have ever rent from. We took over a lease and the process was so smooth and helpful by all staff. They are so polite and quick when in responding. After moving in, we requested a couple of work order and they arranged it right away and maintenance staff came and fixed it in three days. The maintenance staff are very professional and knowledgeable as well. If I can give them 10 stars, I would. Thank you so much for you all hardworking.

google_reviews.author: Jessie Davis
google_reviews.review: Haelley Hogan is very helpful, kind and professional. She listened to me and my concerns and answered all of my questions. I am grateful for her help.

google_reviews.author: Lissa
google_reviews.review: So far, everyone I have interacted with at Landmark, have been professional, courteous and very helpful. I have no complaints, thus far.

google_reviews.author: Dorothy Hall
google_reviews.review: The woman, Victoria was very pleasant and helpful. Even though the apartment was not quite what we needed. Thank You

google_reviews.author: Serafima Zavorotny
google_reviews.review:
What can you expect from a rental company? They were pretty bad, but mostly for the lack of effort and communication they put in. Its nice to be left alone as a tenant, we never had the quarterly inspections or really anyone give us a hard time (except once when they told us we had to mow our lawn, it definitely looked better long but I understand).
However, this lack of communication is why we really didn't enjoy their management. We never (not once!) got emails back when we had questions, if things broke (and things were broken most of the time) it took hours and many, many phone calls to get a hold of anyone. I missed multiple days of classes trying to get in touch with someone about our heating being out during the coldest month of February (it got below 15 degrees and we had no heat in our house).
On that note, there were so many issues with our house which were genuine safety concerns - windows being painted shut, our single toilet consistently breaking (like at least twice a month) and then randomly starting again -- we once called the emergency line because it was a weekend and their response was that we needed to wait until Monday... there were 5 of us and ONE TOILET. Their solution to the no heat problem was to send over 6 space heaters, which immediately flipped the circuits and forced our fridge and freezer to shut off. Our stove top looked like someone had shot at it (literally bullet hole looking things) and the "5th" bedroom they advertised was the size of a walk in closet and I as a 5'2 person could stand straight up only right inside the door. There was no windows in that room and it got above 110 degrees on sunny summer days. I lived in the basement because the fifth bedroom was not a room, the dryer very near to when we moved in got a disconnected aluminum tube that was supposed to send hot wet air outside. Well, it instead filled my room with all of that wet hot air anytime any one used it. We asked them to fix it, got asked to be sent photos, and after we did, no one ever followed up or came to look at it. I tried taping it myself but the moisture was to intense for the tape to stick. My entire room and most of my stuff was often damp for a full year.
I was often genuinely concerned for my well being and the well being of my roommates and I am so glad we decided to move.

google_reviews.author: Jaspreet Singh Sethi
google_reviews.review:
We worked with cami and jill
They were really helpful throughout the whole process
I am excited and looking forward to have cami as our property manager . .

google_reviews.author: Andrea Mendoza
google_reviews.review: Cami Winslow has been so helpful during our business with Landmark. She has worked with me to ensure that things were always running smoothly. Communication with her has always been great. Thanks again !

google_reviews.author: Holly Scott
google_reviews.review: Highly professional staff! Very responsive, helpful and transparent.  I would not hesitate to refer others to work with Erika and her team!

google_reviews.author: Michael Buckner
google_reviews.review: It's unfortunate to have to reach out to the management company to resolve issues, but it's refreshing when the property managers are attentive to the resident's concerns. Thank you, Cami and Yanna for your professionalism.

google_reviews.author: zac BEYER
google_reviews.review: My experience with these incompetent people is all bad. They are slum loards. The two old hags that say they are property managers do nothing when there are legitiment complaints and do comply with the law. If you have a maintenance issue  it might  take the a month when by law says they need to do it within a week. Ever seven years they are supposed to paint. They don't. They are very shady If you can avoid them at all costs. Landmark and all there inept employees are perfect example how no to run a business.

google_reviews.author: Deborah Bernstein
google_reviews.review: Property manager, Cami was so great in assisting me as a new renter. I feel like the whole Landmark team is there for me!

google_reviews.author: Chloe Hoegger
google_reviews.review: Tia was very helpful with the questions I had about my lease. They responded efficiently and were very clear with their answers. It was convenient having a text messaging service to ask any questions I had. I haven't moved into my place yet, so I will post another review after I move out!

google_reviews.author: Tara Tri
google_reviews.review: Kami Winslow was very thorough in explaining the pre-lease process and responded in a timely manner to questions I had as a co-signer.  Thank you Kami!

google_reviews.author: Ashlyn Pixley
google_reviews.review: I had a very difficult time getting ahold of anyone to help during move out (I just wanted the move out instructions) per my lease agreement , my property manager was never available to speak during work hours, listed on the company website, nor the assistant property manager.

google_reviews.author: Stowe Reynolds
google_reviews.review: Great communication throughout. The studio was very clean when I moved in. Everyone interaction was friendly and helpful.

google_reviews.author: Larry Sand
google_reviews.review: Haven't rented through them,  but the secretaries were very helpful

google_reviews.author: Emma Lawrence
google_reviews.review: Jill and Cami were great with helping me though the application is process.Glad to have a great property manager like Cami

google_reviews.author: Michael Zhekov
google_reviews.review: This was probably the best tour guide we have ever had. She was kind friendly and honest every single time we has a tour with her. If I were to move out and get a new apartment for next year I would hope she would be there to help me find a new one. She is defiently deserving of a promotion or pay raise and I hope you guys can get thay for her.

google_reviews.author: Talia Blue
google_reviews.review: The staff is openly dismissive, and responds almost immaturely to any tenets concerns. I have a feeling they are more respectful to higher income tenants, so it goes.

ownerResponse.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are genuinely sorry to hear about your experience and apologize for any dismissive or immature behavior you encountered. We assure you that our team strives to treat all tenants with respect and professionalism, regardless of income level.

Your concerns are important to us, and we would appreciate the opportunity to address them directly. Please reach out to us at info@visitlandmark.com with more details about your experience so we can investigate further and work towards a resolution.

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We look forward to the opportunity to make things right.

google_reviews.author: Hannah Alexander
google_reviews.review: Landmark has such amazing people working constantly to help and support their residents. I had such a great experience with this company. The people I personally worked with were amazing and worked so hard to help me with my housing and were extremely kind and supportive the whole process.

google_reviews.author: kahleb richwine
google_reviews.review: Only after applying to three different units and paying 3 different application fees w/ Landmark was I made aware that you have to submit a holding fee to even be considered. Then, they stacked several additional administrative fees that added up to about $600 after first months rent & security deposit. And after moving into the unit, we discovered bed bugs & ticks that same day. Cannot recommend avoiding Landmark enough.

google_reviews.author: Olivia CHARBONNEAU
google_reviews.review: Cary is wonderful! My apartment recently flooded and she was with me every step of the way. It was such a stressful time and I can honestly say she made it so much easier on me and my cat. She went above and beyond any other property manager Ive ever had. Thank you!

google_reviews.author: Evan Piehler
google_reviews.review: Landmark is terrible. They will schedule showings without talking to tenants and even if you reach out to them to set times that works for all parties they will ignore you and schedule whenever they want and blame you for the bad times. They also DO NOT care about tenants safety or longevity. There was a rash of break-ins at the apartment I lived at and when asked about camera's or some type of safety feature they lied about trying to solve the issue and have done nothing. The ONLY thing landmark cares about is getting your money. They are not helpful and have terrible communication.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Evan, thank you for the feedback. If you have any or other specific items, you would like to address please feel free to reach out to our Director of Human Resources at Stephanie@visitlandmark.com with your concerns.

google_reviews.author: Trevor Smith
google_reviews.review: Super friendly and helpful! Took extra time to show me the site I was originally looking at, and offered to show me a second site in a comparable price range as an option. Had all the pricing and features laid out on paper as well as what was available on the website. Really an excellent experience overall. I would recommend without question!

google_reviews.author: Brent Guier
google_reviews.review: Tia was right on time, very nice and efficient. I liked that she had all needed paperwork ready to go prior to my arrival! Great company representative. The main office was also a great experience!

ownerResponse.text:
Thank you so much. Was great meeting you.
Tia

google_reviews.author: Ariana
google_reviews.review: I bought a brand new car yesterday. Woke up this morning to my car missing. Landmark had it towed, even though it had a parking pass in it! Not only are there at least 10 cars in the parking lot with no passes, Ive seen multiple get warnings. Yet mine is towed first night with a parking pass. Not the only problem Ive had with landmark but definitely the biggest. I dont recommend.

google_reviews.author: BlackBerry & friends
google_reviews.review:
My family and I were approved for a unit and when it was available for them to
go in after the last tenant, they didn't want to fix anything That needed to be fixed to get us into the unit. Be careful if you're living in a unit on Alabama because some of the stuff has not been fixed or serviced since 2020 and wires are exposed. In the unit as well as mold and a bunch of other stuff that they refused to fix even though they had my holding deposit for over a month and a 1/2 and held me up looking for another place and refused to do any kind of work on the townhouse. Says that they will have their financial department. Reach? Out to you when your holding fee is ready but it will take more than two weeks to get back and they hold you up more! I'm glad I won't be renting from them and that housing saved me for a headache!!

google_reviews.author: Hanne Hojsted
google_reviews.review: I am extremely  happy with the outstanding service from manager cami  and Jill  and I shall recommend  them to everyone who is looking  for a great place to live

google_reviews.author: Ingo Schoeppler
google_reviews.review: Always promptly replied to and addresses any issues/,problems that popped up. Cami was always a pleasure to deal with.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Ingo, thank you for the 5 stars!

google_reviews.author: Brittany G
google_reviews.review: Great experience with Haelley touring 1818 D street! Informative and polite!

google_reviews.author: jardine silan
google_reviews.review: I love my new place here at Francis Park. Much love for Lolly she made it happen, the best property manager I ever had. I feel at home. Neighbors are great.

google_reviews.author: G Large
google_reviews.review: Clean, secure, friendly and helpful management. Convenient to downtown and public transportation.

google_reviews.author: Holly Scott
google_reviews.review: Tia and the office staff at Landmark have been terrific!  They have been super helpful and attentive during the application process! -holly

google_reviews.author: Matt F
google_reviews.review:
Such poor decision making and lack of understanding for employees and tenants and their needs.
Extremely disappointed in letting go one of the best on-site property managers that looked after the well-being of tenants and always went the extra mile to make sure each and every tenant was safe and felt comfortable within their own home. It's a sad day for landmark for choosing to let go one of the best on-site managers. Tull Wood apt.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Matt,
Thank you for providing this feedback regarding Tullwood Apartments. While we are not able to share any surrounding circumstances, we can say that we completely understand the frustrations that arise as a result of any kind of changes that directly impact our tenants where they live, and Landmark would not make such a hard decision lightly because of that awareness of impact. Landmark wants nothing more than to provide safe, and comfortable living spaces within our community for all of our tenants and proceed with decisions with that mission in mind. If there is any support you feel would help or if you would just like to talk to someone further about any concerns that you have, please do not hesitate to email: info@visitlandmark.com and title your email Tullwood Apt.- Google for further assistance. 
Thank you for sharing and have a wonderful rest of your day.

google_reviews.author: Janet Panis
google_reviews.review: I love the apartment.  The problem is that we have 3 cars (1 each for the 3 people wanting to live there) and parking is problematic.  We had to walk up 1 block in the opposite direction on Constellation to find parking.  Im sorry, this will not work for us.

google_reviews.author: Nathan
google_reviews.review: Had a great day being shown apartments by Tia! She was very knowledgeable but never overbearing, giving us plenty of time and space to check things out and ask questions at our own pace. Thank you, Tia!

google_reviews.author: Jw
google_reviews.review: I really liked landmark before. Our old property manager was spectacular, the person who replaced her, Katherine is absolutely not. Im trying to move units and she was so rude and condescending on the phone, and treating me like I am stupid because of not being able to locate a form properly (it is labeled weirdly on the website causing confusion) still continuing the process but know she is making it sour. Moving is stressful and nobody needs the property manager themselves making it harder than it has to be. If she is still my PM when moving units Im already planning on asking for a new one.

ownerResponse.text: We are very sorry to hear you feel this way, and we greatly appreciate your patience through some of our recent internal changes. We completely understand the impact that these movements make on our tenants and want to make any transition as smooth as possible. We would be happy to assist you in any way that we can to improve your experience and the service we provide. Please feel free to send your feedback for a direct follow-up to info@visitlandmark.com with the subject line, "Form Feedback" for direct contact information for immediate assistance.

google_reviews.author: William Becker
google_reviews.review: Erika & the team upfront and in back offices were so efficient and helpful!

google_reviews.author: Amber Chaput
google_reviews.review: Everyone is so caring and kind! I've had a very pleasant experience with Landmark and highly recommend this company!

google_reviews.author: Sam Magno
google_reviews.review: I had the pleasure of working with Cami at Landmark and I couldn't be happier with her service. Her team has been incredibly helpful and responsive to any needs or concerns. Even through the change on tenant steps she made the process easy and stress-free.

google_reviews.author: Clare Wong
google_reviews.review: They were nice to me at first but then after few basic questions they became very annoyed and flustered. Terrible unprofessional communication, Ive been reaching out since they claim Is very urgent but they never even get back to me after reaching out on multiple platforms. Im disappointed with my experience and feel discriminated. Awfully rude and not respectful when us as tenants been respectful this whole time. Really bad attitude and was yelling at me

ownerResponse.text: Hello Clare, we are so terribly sorry for your experience and would be grateful if you could provide us with an opportunity to change your impression. Please contact us at your earliest convenience to let us know with more specifics about your circumstances and we will do whatever we can to assist you with whatever you need. Please reach out to us at: info@visitlandmark.com via email and title your email: Clare Wong. We will ensure that a manager is available to assist you and listen your experience and the surrounding circumstances, so that we may improve moving forward. We do not want anyone to walk away feeling not heard, and not helped.

google_reviews.author: Lindsey Brehm
google_reviews.review: Beautiful apartments.  The showing agent was very helpful and answered all my questions.

google_reviews.author: Drew Secules
google_reviews.review: They incorrectly put a notice on my door when I was moving out that said I had to pay first and last months rent or be evicted when I had already paid. When I was moving out the property manager (Sarah Lynn Mazza or something) said the people in my apartment complex live like roaches. They had no record of allowing me access to the shared garage beneath my apartment and I lost personal items including $60 snow shoes. PSE accidentally had a problem with my account and charged both Landmark and I, and Landmark also charged us to pay them back. When we got it settled with PSE they informed us that Landmark is to pay us back and Landmark said its not their responsibility. They were stingy about my last security deposit, and were rude in general. I left renting through landmark and chose to rent through somewhere else. Then my landlord sold out to landmark and upon taking over they immediately raised my old cracked walls one bedroom apartment in Ferndale with no in house laundry or dishwasher (or garage or anything special) from $900 / mo to $1,200 / mo in one go. I will move out as soon as I can.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Drew,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of your tenancy with Landmark Property Management, even though you do not have positive examples to share with us we still appreciate the feedback. At Landmark, we are constantly striving to do better at creating positive tenant experiences and providing tenant services. These examples of oversight on our part will be reviewed, noted, and surely not repeated. 
If there is anything else you would like to share with us, please feel free to reach out to info@visitlandmark.com, title your email: Drew Secules, and someone will be there to listen and assist you in any capacity we can. 

Best Regards,
The Landmark Team

google_reviews.author: Paige Vinton
google_reviews.review: I have never actually rented from Landmark, but was interested in one of their properties. It has been a long time since I have rented, so I had a lot of questions. While I was navigating through the process, I had to constantly follow-up on my questions. I was told I would be sent information and it never happened. If it was this challenging just to get information and answers, I can't imagine what it would be like renting through their company.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Paige, thank you for the feedback on your experience. We will be following up with your showing agent and reviewing your request for additional information to find out how we can improve, and what caused the breakdown in our follow through with communication. We are very sorry that we let you down and hope we have the opportunity to regain your trust!

google_reviews.author: Brea Black
google_reviews.review: So nice to be shown around endless buildings by Tia. Between her and Brittany we found the perfect unit for my dad! The front desk crew is also so kind, patient and helpful. I appreciate the whole team!!

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Brea,
We are so glad you found a unit for your father! Thank you for your wonderful feedback. We love helping people find what they are looking for!

Sincerely,
The Landmark Team

google_reviews.author: Anne Evenson
google_reviews.review: Wow! Everything from start to finish with Priscilla and Erica at Landmark was amazing. We needed an apartment in Bellingham fast and after we filled out our applications they were on it. They guided us through how to submit a holding fee all the way from Austin and were there to answer all of our questions promptly and professionally. And they did what they said they would do every time. We couldn't have asked for better customer service or more friendly people to interact with in our new home. You can't go wrong with this property management company!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Anne, thank you for the 5 stars and the kind words about our team here at Landmark!

google_reviews.author: H La
google_reviews.review:
Terrible customer service, Becca Carr and her whole team. My family is currently renting 2 units with Landmark and we had no problems at all with the previous team. Recently, they changed the new team and it's horrible. I filed for work order on April 27th because the freezer stopped making ice. She followed up with me with a message and I answered her message that the freezer just suddenly stopped working. Then, she just forgot about this email. Now, without a question, if it's suddenly stopped making ice, a normal person would assume something went wrong with the freezer and cooler. However, this lady adressed that I didn't mention anything about the cooler not working. First, who would jump to conclusion immediately without analyzing for information. Second, she didn't want to admit it's her fault for not responding to my email and insisted that we have been communicating via emails, in fact, that didn't happen. Third, she gave me that BS of new construction so it's under warranty and they can't send their men into the unit. Moreover, I called today and brought up this again. The agent answered very unprofessional. "We need name and address, that's more important" with a terrible attitude and tone. Where's "We are sorry that happened to you, can we please get a name and address?" Even McDonald employees are more friendly than Landmark customer service associates. I don't know if we should stay with Landmark for future. This is just very bad experience and unprofessional working ethics from the employees. We are currently paying 3,800-4,000$+ a month for Landmark and for this price, the sastisfaction we received is low to terrible.
It's been 9 days of room temperature food. If anything happens, expect a lawsuit. We have plenty of time and resources to make sure that this is heard !

ownerResponse.text:
Mr Hung La,
We are so sorry for the delay in repairing your refrigerator! We have confirmed that an appliance repair person will be out today to make repairs. We will also follow up with the team handling your request to ensure that future work orders are not delayed and handled professionally. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to regaining your trust.

google_reviews.author: Nicole Martinez
google_reviews.review: Kami Winslow is a GEM to work with! Thank you for your quick action and listening ear :)

google_reviews.author: Rashad Tyson
google_reviews.review: So far a delightful experience. Everyone has been very communicative and easy to get a hold of.

google_reviews.author: Isabelle Garten
google_reviews.review: I have never rented from another company but that is because Landmark has been amazing for the last 2 years. Prompt maintenance, responce to emails, and clear communication (I am also the person to read every word in a contract, which helps avoid surprises because I know what I am getting into. Definitely reccomend for some of these 1 star people). They do have a weird thing with lease takeovers where the security deposit continues through the years, but if you trust your takeover people then we simply figured it out like adults and the people moving in paid the people moving out. It is a weird law but not the end if the world. I also appreciate that we can pay a securing deposit for an apartment we like before viewing or before our applications are processed. Sure, it is a gamble as to whether we get our money back, but it is a well informed one that we take advantage of in the competitive apartment world of bellingham. Overall, I love Landmark and look forward to renting from them another year! Leslie is my current go to person and she is wonderful ^.^

ownerResponse.text: Hi Isabelle, we really appreciate the 5 stars and your amazing feedback about the team here at Landmark, especially about one of our property managers, Leslie!!! We are happy your overall experience has been 5 stars!

google_reviews.author: Dennis Kaiser
google_reviews.review: Having rented from Landmark for now almost 5 years-- I have been satisficed with the possible exception of Renters Insurance renewal. Every year in November I get a notice letting me know I need to provide a copy of my renewed renters policy. As an insurance agent I encourage all RENTERS to get a renters policy but also make sure the Property Mgmt CO is listed as an Additional interested party. This ensures that a copy is sent to them at each renewal. This does not however eliminate your reminder notice threatening a charge for not uploading to the portal your new policy. I do know that Landmark will upload the notice for you if they receive it. Most insurers send 30 plus days prior to the renewal the notice just like they do with Mortgage Companies who most likely are paying the bill for the homeowner out of escrow funds. If you are not sure you can call Landmark and ask if the portal shows your active version of the policy. Its extra steps but may reduce some frustration otherwise.  Good luck!

google_reviews.author: Kalee Lamb
google_reviews.review: Cami Winslow is a great property manager to work with. Very personable, always willing to help with whatever she can, and always gets back to me within the day.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Kalee, thank you for the 5 stars and the kind feedback!

google_reviews.author: Alex L
google_reviews.review: Stayed in the Fairhaven Lofts and had a great experience! Maintenance was easy, communication was great, and receiving deposit back was no issue either. Fantastic building to stay in, would highly recommend.

google_reviews.author: Aaron Tyska
google_reviews.review: Had a wonderful experience working with Tia. She was able to answer all my questions.

google_reviews.author: Nate Tatem
google_reviews.review:
Their website isnt updated and their representatives are not all on the same page with what is available. It is such a waste of time and so disorganized.

I applied for a property because it was available online, then Im told it isnt actually available. Then they let me transfer my app to a new place, but then Im told that property has actually been unavailable for two weeks now. So now Im transferring the app AGAIN. It is annoying, ineffective, and demonstrates a disregard for the importance of housing in the community.

google_reviews.author: Kody Giltner
google_reviews.review: Staff are rude and unaccommodating. came for the day from out of town and wanted to view two units in the same building and was told there were 10 other showings in that unit that day and I would only have 10 minutes to view 1 unit. Basic math 10, 10 minute showings only adds up to just over an hour and a half. Less than the time it took me to drive to town. I Would have been more accepting of this wack  policy had the staff not been so rude. I cant imagine how they treat their renters if they are this dreadful to prospective customers

ownerResponse.text: Kody, we are very sorry for letting you down! We did not do a good job of explaining our showing process to you up front, which unfortunately does not allow prospective tenants to schedule more than one showing at the same time slot. We sure appreciate your feedback so that we can continue to make improvements to our very busy showing schedule (we schedule group showings every 45 minutes) and ensure all prospective tenants are treated with excellent customer service and educated on our processes.

google_reviews.author: Hope Beck
google_reviews.review:
I signed a lease for my apartment and am scheduled to move out on July 15th. I didn't necessarily have the best experience because for the last month, I was supposed to be charged a prorated amount and I was charged for a full month. After receiving the receipt, I called and spoke to the property manager assistant, who was very not helpful, blamed me for what happened, and told me that I would be refunded (in an unknown amount of time). HOWEVER, I called the office and spoke to Ashley, who was so understanding and incredible. I had called my bank and I was pretty sure that the charge wouldn't go through at all, but I won't know until after my rent payment is technically late. She not only assured me that it obviously was not my fault that the charge was incorrect, but she helped me fix the whole mess that I am in and made sure that I would not be charged any late fees for when it is fixed. Other than that, I haven't had any other issues with Landmark. She did say that this happened to a few people though, so I would check in with them to make sure that your online account is set up right before the last few months of your lease. They really need to change their system.
Their customer service regarding the main office has always been great for me though. Before I spoke to Ashley, I called and spoke to another receptionist who was also so kind and understanding and helpful. That's always been their saving grace in my opinion.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Hope, Thank you for the 4 star review and the kind words about Ashley and our other front desk associates! They are amazing and do so much on a daily all year round! Don't hesitate to reach back out if your tenant ledger doesn't get updated so we can fix it!

google_reviews.author: Stephanie Delgado
google_reviews.review: Landmark has been amazing. I have had the same rental for almost 9 years. Katherine my leasing specialist has extended so much help and kindness and patience.

google_reviews.author: Nunya bizniz
google_reviews.review: Do not rent a house from landmark!  They   Run a shady business. They will scam you one way or another.

ownerResponse.text:
We're deeply troubled by your review and want to assure you that integrity and honesty are core values at our company. It's disheartening to hear that you feel this way about your experience with us.

Your satisfaction and trust are of utmost importance to us, and we take your feedback seriously. We would appreciate the opportunity to understand your concerns in more detail and address them appropriately. Please reach out to us at info@visitlandmark.com with further information about your experience so we can investigate and resolve any issues.

We value your input and are committed to improving our services. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

google_reviews.author: Samantha Johnson
google_reviews.review: Im living in my absolute dream place thanks to Landmark! Their team has been nothing but kind, attentive and helpful.

ownerResponse.text:
Appreciate your time Samantha.
Thank you
Tia

google_reviews.author: Jessica Conant
google_reviews.review: Ive been with Landmark since 2018 for good reason. This is the only property management that I trust to rent through. They worked with me to change viewing times for my apartment. Maintenance shows up at decent time. They give you a full 48 hour notice of entry, plus usually an extra day or so so that you know. All the properties I have lived at through them have been really nice. I havent had a problem with mold for years! Its sad to say, but I think this is the only property management in Bellingham that views tenants as people instead of piggy banks. I feel like some property managements expect the worst out of tenants, and well those managements likely just got what was coming for them. You get what you give. Respect is earned. Treat tenants with respect and you are more likely to receive that respect back.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Jessica, we really appreciate the 5 stars and your amazing feedback about the team here at Landmark!!! We are happy your overall experience has been 5 stars!

google_reviews.author: Charles
google_reviews.review: I've been a tenant with Landmark a few years. Property management isn't easy but they have gone above and beyond for me multiple times, I can't speak for everyone but my experience has been very positive. Cami is great.

google_reviews.author: Mack Whaley
google_reviews.review: I enjoy the consistency of Landmark Real Estate. I am always told when I get a new property manager, the portal is easy to use, and the leases tend to be very similar. I have found that maintenance requests are sometimes ignored which is stressful when it comes to flooding, water damage, or the use of everyday appliances. I do believe that rent is consistently too high for this community and living costs. My property manager, Cami Lawrence, has fantastic communication including speedy replies and a willingness to reiterate ideas when necessary. I always feel heard by her!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Mack, thank you for the amazing feedback about one of our property managers here at Landmark!

google_reviews.author: Jose Lopez
google_reviews.review: This company runs a scam and please beware. They will let you create a application and charge you 50 dollars per person. Say its you and your spouse, you go look at the apartment and someone else puts a holding fee which is 400 dollars and takes it before you can even look at the apartment. We asked for our 100 bucks for our application fees since we didnt even get to start the process of even doing a background or finance check. We tried calling multiple times and emailed them and they do not pick up their phones.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Jose, we appreciate your feedback; our applications are $45 per applicant and valid for 30 days. We have refunded your applications per your request. We do require that a holding fee is placed on the unit to secure your application to the unit you are interested in renting as it was stated in the before you begin section of the application along with on our website in the application process section. We are in our peak season so our phone lines do stay pretty busy during this time of year but if you left a voicemail we would have reached back out to you the same day.

google_reviews.author: Jacob Sikich
google_reviews.review: Vanessa was amazing! She went the extra mile and stayed 10 minutes after her scheduled shift end-time so I could place a hold on an apartment that I had fallen in love with. Her customer service skills were amazing. Very professional, and very down to earth. I look forward to letting my friends/family know about my great experience here today. Vanessa set the bar extremely high with her first impression, and Landmark Real Estate should do everything they can to hold on to her!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Jacob, thank you for the 5 stars and the kind words about one of our front desk staff members!

google_reviews.author: Christina
google_reviews.review: Worst property management company in existence. AVOID at all costs. We only signed a lease from August to September with Landmark out of necessity, because we were moving out of state. Maintenance requests were laughable, took so much harassing to get anything done. Just moved out a month ago from the apartment we lived in for just over a year and received 1/3 of the security deposit back after all the bogus cleaning and repair fees. We left the place in immaculate condition for its age (the previous tenant lived there 21 years), much better than move in condition, with pictures and witnesses to prove it. In addition, they performed the move-out inspection before our lease was even up, when we still had things there, and said that we did not clean the unit.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Christina, thank you for the feedback. If you have any other specific items, you would like to address please feel free to reach out to our Director of Human Resources at Stephanie@visitlandmark.com with your concerns.

google_reviews.author: REDD ACTED
google_reviews.review:
My experience renting with Landmark so far (~7mo.) has been pretty good. The units are nice, the app makes payments, maintenance requests, and receiving documents easy, the application process is pretty straightforward, and they communicate frequently.

My big gripe with them so far is that every single time I've talked to the front desk for questions ranging from small ones to important legal information (which I guess to be fair I probably shouldn't have talked to them for), the info I have received has been wrong. Every time. I have a go to person now that I bug for everything because she is literally the only person who knows the actual answers to questions.

Don't get me wrong, I have no problem with the front desk people not knowing everything, but they really need to stop giving answers out so confidently even though they have no clue, or only know part of the truth.

It also seems that the signing of documents and some other processes fall on one person to do, so if that person takes any amount of vacation the process is completely halted (including answering questions since as mentioned only that one person is likely to know).

Otherwise, like I said the places are nice and aside from the misinformation that I get more often than I'd like, they are pretty nice to rent from.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Redd, we really appreciate your feedback about our team here at Landmark and we are taking your feedback seriously as we enter into our busy season.

google_reviews.author: Heather Knight
google_reviews.review: Amber was amazing!  She was helpful in working with all four student tenants to get the paperwork in and signed.  She was quick to respond to questions and always friendly.  I have enjoyed my experience in working with her so far:)

ownerResponse.text: Hi Heather, thank you for the 5 stars and the kind feedback! We hope your entire experience with Landmark remains at 5 stars!

google_reviews.author: Jon Garner
google_reviews.review: Very pushy people. At first they act friendly but when they think they can get away with taking your rights away as a tenant they will. Clearly a bad decision in going with this company I understand most are like this but the actions they have done I feel they are being hard so they can get a few laughs.  Anyone that is looking for a new spot for their business or home I would recommend going somewhere else.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Jon, we are sorry that you had a poor experience. We don't see you as an active or previous client in our system. If you could reach out with additional context to your review, we would appreciate the opportunity to correct your concerns.

google_reviews.author: Sara Halfmann
google_reviews.review: We have had a great experience overall with Landmark. Theyve been very quick to respond to our emails and voicemails, often responding within the business day if they can. Vanessa showed us a beautiful apartment and was so incredibly sweet. She answered all of our questions and helped us out as much as possible. She is not only kind but also very professional. Thank you very much for your thoughtfulness and effort!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Sara, thank you for the 5 stars and the really kind words about our team member Vanessa!

google_reviews.author: Josef
google_reviews.review: Would not recommend renting from any of their apartments. Horrible real estate management company, with fees abound, and be careful with any payments you make to them. Any extra service or change of tenancy is a non refundable fee, even if you don't go through with it. Wouldn't let my wife and child live with me, the legality of that is beyond me. Rent is outrageous for what you get, parking spaces in my complex were below the legal size, and just in general rude to their tenants. It's unbelievable they can get away with this, something needs to be done in this country about these landlords/REM companies. Don't go through Landmark if you can avoid it, which I know is hard since only a few companies operate in Bellingham.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Milan, we appreciate your feedback. If you have any other specific items, you would like to address please feel free to reach out to our Director of Human Resources at Stephanie@visitlandmark.com with your concerns.

google_reviews.author: Hoekema Family
google_reviews.review: The WORST management company EVER!  Crazy RUDE staff members that work here.  They hang up on you left and right.  They are crude, short and not helpful AT ALL.  TIA the head of tours is extremely RUDE and Talked over me constantly and ended up hanging up on me.  Worst ever!

google_reviews.author: Carolyn Cutting
google_reviews.review: Amber was wonderful with assisting us in securing an apartment for this year! She offered great communication and updates as we moved through the application stages. She was very helpful in ensuring that we knew exactly what was needed and when by the Landmark Real Estate Office.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Carolyn, thank you for the 5 stars and the kind feedback!

google_reviews.author: Soriah Clark
google_reviews.review: Problems weve had with landmark managing our house for LESS than 1 month: Couldnt set up a rent portal to pay rent. Called several times and either couldnt get a hold of them or they didnt send the information needed to set up an account after the call that they said they would. Got a huge late fee. Got a moving in fee even though weve been living in the same house for 2 years. Had to go into the office to talk to Landmark multiple times in a few weeks because they are so disorganized and hard to reach, and they made my roommate cry one of those times because they were so rude.

ownerResponse.text: HI Soriah, thank you for the feedback. If you have any other specific items, you would like to address please feel free to reach out to our Director of Human Resources at Stephanie@visitlandmark.com with your concerns.

google_reviews.author: Carlos V
google_reviews.review:
Avoid Landmark at all costs. They are extremely predatory, unprofessional and will try to screw you over whenever they can. Starting with showings. When I first toured a few of their units the agent showed up late and high. The first unit we were showed seemed like the current tenant was not made aware or the unit being showed. Her underwear and belongings were all over the place. It was very uncomfortable and if I were in their shoes I would not want strangers walking around my apartment and touching my underwear; which leads me to the second reason. Landmark tried to show my aparment without my consent months before the end of my lease. They notfied me they were going to show up and expected my apartment to be cleaned. The day they chose I had work and class, I could not be there. They said it didnt matter and they were going to show up anyways. When I complained, they half quoted a law that allows landlords to show units and asked me to write them a statement explaining why I didnt want to show my unit so they could give it to their lawyers. After a quick google search I found the law they quoted and noticed they only stated half of the law, it explicitly says that a landord cannot show a unit without the tenants pressence or consent. Even then, they insisted on showing my unit. They only stopped once I notified them that I had valuable delicate computer equipment, a firearm, and that I would press charges if they trespassed without my consent. Landmark has no regard for privacy, once you sign their lease they will stop showing any sense of respect. The whole time I was emailing back and forth with their office, the lady I was speaking to kept forwarding me their internal emails. In their conversations they were being very disrespectful and outright vulgar while referring to me.

Please just avoid Landmark, talk to any local before you sign and they will tell you how bad it is.
If you're a college student, save yourself the pain and simply find another apartment. Dealing with work, school and a landlord that wants a dozen people touching your belongings was the most stressing week I ever had.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Carlos, thank you for the feedback.

google_reviews.author: Sydney Agnew
google_reviews.review: I had a short-notice job offer that required me to relocate at the drop of a hat. After a few of my listings fell through or got snatched up, Vanessa made it her personal mission to help me find a new home in 12 hours. After five phone calls, three showings, and no small amount of blind optimism, we found the perfect apartment and I was able to put a holding fee down on the spot. I swear I had her running around nearly all day, but she absolutely came through for me and for that I'm so very grateful. Can't wait to move into my new home!

ownerResponse.text: Hi Sydney, thank you for the 5 stars and the kind words about one of our staff members!

google_reviews.author: Kathryn Sanford
google_reviews.review: Appreciated Tia meeting me and showing me around when I didnt have an appointment!

google_reviews.author: Thomas Munro
google_reviews.review:
We LOVE working with Landmark.  We've been tenants as well as subcontractors for Landmark and have always had a great experience.  We've worked with more than half of the staff in one capacity or another over the years and everyone has always been great.

All of the property managers and staff that we have worked with (about a dozen people) have always worked hard to treat their tenants with respect and care, while at the same time maximizing their efforts for the property owners.

I would highly encourage anyone to work with Landmark, either as a property owner, tenant or subcontractor.  The staff and company are awesome!

ownerResponse.text: Thomas, thank you for the  star review!

google_reviews.author: Garrett W
google_reviews.review:
After staying here for about a year in one of their happy valley apts. I was extremely impressed with how quickly and professionally they respond to issues. Our dryer broke within a week of moving in and it was replaced with no questions asked. Same goes for our dishwasher that happened a few months ago. Marianna (the property manager of my apartment) is extremely friendly and more importantly understanding of personal situations. Shes been nothing but caring while weve stayed here and its a night and day difference from our previous property management company MMRA.

G. Walker

ownerResponse.text: Hi Rearden, thank you so much for these really kind words about Marianna and the 5 stars!

google_reviews.author: Camren Cambra
google_reviews.review:
Updating my review of Landmark due to a change in situation. Long story short, they are as unprofessional and crooked as the rest of the reviews say, even if they manage to put on a good face for a while.

After signing a mutual lease termination in October, they allowed my ex-roommate to stay on the premises for an additional 45 days, during which time he didn't pay rent, utilities, or keep the place clean. At the time they told me not to worry about it, the lease termination meant I wasn't responsible for anything he did after.
After they served him a pay or vacate notice he left, but the apartment was trashed. I offered to clean it up before they did the final move out, as I felt bad he'd been so irresponsible and appreciated what I thought was their help. They told me I wasn't allowed to go back and clean or repair anything because I terminated my lease months ago.

Then, in March, about a week after I move out of the Tullwood apartments and am no longer a Landmark customer, they send me a $1500 bill that includes not only the rent and utilities my former roommate owed, but also all the damages and cleaning fees. That's $1500 AFTER my deposit, which I did not get back when the lease was terminated in October.

Thinking it was a misunderstanding, I called the office several times over the course of the week, and the property managers refused to take or return my calls. It was finally the accountant Rich who said that even with the lease termination I was still responsible for the charges, and to pay up or go to collections.

What a nightmare.

ownerResponse.text: Carmen, thank you so very much for this kind review. It means a lot to our staff -- Kim, Kimberly and Amy -- who we know work very hard to accomodate the needs of rental home clients.  We're glad you're now tucked safety in Tullwood.

google_reviews.author: Barbara Fletcher
google_reviews.review:
We have been with Landmark Real Estate Management for the past 3 years.
Their processes have been solid from the moment we signed up to have our properties managed, since we live out of state.
